title: "Steep Spike For Chip Complexity And Unknowns"
excerpt: "Cramming more and different kinds of processors and memories onto a die or into a package is causing the number of unknowns and the complexity of those designs to skyrocket. There are good reasons for combining all of these different devices into an SoC or advanced package."
